content.question: Who is the subject of cogitur (line 3) ?Identify two of the actions this person is compelled to perform in lines 2-3 (Ire . . . amori), and write out and translate the Latin words or phrases that support your answer.

frqParts.text: Who is the subject of cogitur (line 3) ?Identify two of the actions this person is compelled to perform in lines 2-3 (Ire . . . amori), and write out and translate the Latin words or phrases that support your answer.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
